title: pAhi krSNa
sahitya:
pAhi krSNa vAsudEva dEhi sadgatim mAdhava


anupallavi

  EhitArthada su-vibhava drOhi kamsa hara kEshava


caraNam    kandarAtala pari shObhita bandhura mNi bhUSaNa sata
 gandha vAhana suta pUjita sindhu shayana suguNa bharita
kunda kusuma su-virAjita mandahAsa sura vandita
mandarAdri dhara muninata nandagOpa suta sucarta
